doc.title: Repo

value.content: In a revision control system like Git or SVN, a repo (i.e. "repository") is a place that hosts an application's code source, together with various metadata.

doc.summary: In a revision control system like Git or SVN, a repo (i.e. "repository") is a place that hosts an application's code source, together with various metadata.
